aka: Joë Caligula - Du suif chez les dabes

cast.name: 吉内特·勒克莱尔 Ginette Leclerc
茹涅·阿斯托尔 Junie Astor
马塞尔·加索克 Marcel Gassouk
米歇尔·勒穆瓦纳 Michel Lemoine

trans_title: Joë Caligula - Du suif chez les dabes
introduction: One of the most famous Bénazéraf 60s flick....Albert Camus's Caligula in a film noir context, with more sex, more violence.....As usual, this is not top notch video quality....Next : L'enfer sur la plage (1965) (not to be confused with sin on the beach, english title for L'éternité pour nous (1961))And I stole Yann's description from the dvd r (forgive me...) :A group of aspiring young thugs from Marseilles move in on established gangsters. They spend the time torturing, killing and intimidating the gangsters until they either pay up or die. One punk with a sexual attraction for his sister is turned in by the girl after a degrading sex scene. The newcomers shake down bars and bistros in their efforts to become part of the violent and brutal criminal underworld. ~ Dan Pavlides, All Movie Guide
